articles.description: The nation's biggest life insurer with revenue of $97.26 billion and a profit of $553.8 million, was ranked 98th on the just released Fortune 500 list. Reliance Industries jumped 51 places to 104 on the 2022 list.
articles.content: Recently-listed Life Insurance Corporation () has broken into the latest Fortune Global 500 list, while has jumped 51 places. The nation's biggest life insurer with revenue of $97.26 billion and a pr… [+1483 chars]

articles.title: Byju Raveendran's moment of reckoning | Mint - Mint
